entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
